name: BeastieBot
body:
### Welcome to the Home of the Beastie Bot.
The Beastie Bot is an auto-rap generator that takes a theme and spits out a hot Beastie Boys inspired rap. This project was created for a Software Design class at Olin College by Mackenzie Frackleton (@frackleton), Bill Wong (@billmwong), Emily Mamula (@emamula), and Robert Siegel (@robertsiegel).

###Project Proposal
Project Proposal can be found [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1CcoOHFVMxjzHP91ei-DhcNqvn7SwzDynbRR_hatNOgU/edit?usp=sharing).

###Design Review: Preparation and Framing
Our preparation and framing writeup for the first design review can be found [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QiwPjXxHo9CfwAKzAOvzPYnCQvOWz43DsxZtZUa79PM/edit?usp=sharing).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
